name: CORECIVIC INC
sampleDescriptions: Issues pertaining to the construction and management of privately-operated prisons and detention facilities. Consistent with CoreCivic policy, Akin Gump does not lobby for or against any policies or legislation that would determine the basis for an individual's incarceration or detention.
